ygData.subject: Re: Languages
ygData.msgSnippet: If you need Old Erudin on fenin ro, search for Avari. I have Excelent. I prefere if we can change languages. Like the other learning me another language. ...
ygData.messageBody:
If you need Old Erudin on fenin ro, search for Avari. I have Excelent.
I prefere if we can change languages. Like the other learning me another
language.
-----Original Message-----
From: Ken Lee <kenlee@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, May 25, 1999 5:10 PM
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Languages


>From: "Ken Lee" <kenlee@...>
>
>>anyone know if you can learn the other languages if they are not listed in
>>your skills? Thanks.
>
>
> Of a certainty. Just ask Chen who attended one of our language lessons
>on Solusek Ro. He was running around clutching his head and screaming.
>Passing out and all. Too funny. But to get to the meat of the story,
yes.You
>DO have to zone to see an improvement or a new language.
>
>
>Zalbar
>20th Level
>Solusek Ro
>
